Posting form data

You need a form key to post to a Tina4 Post route, in twig this is easy to add to into your form 

 <form action="/post-route" method="post">
    <button>Submit</button>
    {{ "reason for token" | formToken | raw }}
 </form>

In code the token is also available as 

 $_SESSION["tina4:authToken"]

You can define how load a token lasts in your env file 

 TINA4_TOKEN_MINUTES=5
